title: How to Wrap Presents (Kids)

steps.headline: Get a nice Christmas bag.
steps.description: They can have penguins, Snoopy (from peanuts), Santa, snowmen, etc.

steps.headline: Get some tissue paper and put a little on the bottom, put the gift in, and put the rest on top and fluff it out!
steps.description: Then, after that, put a sticker tag on the bag and address it! There you go! The bagged method!

steps.headline: Put the gift in the middle evenly.
Measure twice to make sure you only have to cut once.
steps.description: Get out the estimated amount, wrap it but don't crease it, and then cut any excess!

steps.headline: Fold the long sides up and tape in the middle.
Crease the corners into the shape of the present.
Fold the remaining flaps over the creases you just made.
Tape again and you're done folding!
Cut a small rectangle and fold it in half and write the person its from (you) and the person it's going to.
steps.description: Add a bow and your done!

text: Bagged Method Get a nice Christmas bag. They can have penguins, Snoopy (from peanuts), Santa, snowmen, etc. Get some tissue paper and put a little on the bottom, put the gift in, and put the rest on top and fluff it out! Then, after that, put a sticker tag on the bag and address it! There you go! The bagged method! Wrapped Method Get the wrapping paper.  Put the gift in the middle evenly.  Measure twice to make sure you only have to cut once. Get out the estimated amount, wrap it but don't crease it, and then cut any excess! Fold the long sides up and tape in the middle.  Crease the corners into the shape of the present.  Fold the remaining flaps over the creases you just made.  Tape again and you're done folding!  Cut a small rectangle and fold it in half and write the person its from (you) and the person it's going to. Add a bow and your done!
sentences: Bagged Method Get a nice Christmas bag.
They can have penguins, Snoopy (from peanuts), Santa, snowmen, etc.
Get some tissue paper and put a little on the bottom, put the gift in, and put the rest on top and fluff it out!
Then, after that, put a sticker tag on the bag and address it!
Wrapped Method Get the wrapping paper.
Put the gift in the middle evenly.
Measure twice to make sure you only have to cut once.
Get out the estimated amount, wrap it but don't crease it, and then cut any excess!
Fold the long sides up and tape in the middle.
Crease the corners into the shape of the present.
Fold the remaining flaps over the creases you just made.
Tape again and you're done folding!
Cut a small rectangle and fold it in half and write the person its from (you) and the person it's going to.
Add a bow and your done!
